Rulings.Edison:
●The effect to add “Fire Ant Ascator” or “Supay” to your hand activates even during the Damage Step.
●If the ATK of “Oracle of the Sun” is being doubled by “Supay” and “Skill Drain” is activated, the ATK remains doubled.
●When you Special Summon “Oracle of the Sun” with the effect of “Supay” it is Special Summoned with 2000 ATK. Then you apply any bonuses from Field Spells or continuous effects.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to add "Fire Ant Ascator" or "Supay" to your hand activates even during the Damage Step.\n2. If the ATK of "Oracle of the Sun" is being doubled by "Supay" and "Skill Drain" is activated, the ATK remains doubled.\n3. When you Special Summon "Oracle of the Sun" with the effect of "Supay" it is Special Summoned with 2000 ATK. Then you apply any bonuses from Field Spells or continuous effects.

PSCT.Base: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Fire Ant Ascator" or "Supay" from your Deck to your hand.
